title: Black screen after accepting queue
body:
I get a black screen for about 5 seconds after pressing accept to join a game. It only happens in Ranked/Draft queue.

Any ideas? it's never happened before and only been happening since a few patches ago.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=TKEyVpqN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-31T21:24:33.990+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.

Didnt help
Could you run through the [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for me, let me know if anything helps.
